import { Portal } from 'bumbag';
import Theme from '../../components/Theme';

# Portal

## Import

```jsx
import { Portal } from 'bumbag';
```

## Usage

```jsx-live
<Box>Hello world. <Portal>I am a portal attached to the bottom of the page.</Portal></Box>
```
